info.name: Mindmaps
info.summary: This Nextcloud app allows you to create awesome mindmaps together with your colleagues.
info.description:
This Nextcloud app allows you to create awesome mindmaps together with your colleagues. You can easily share them with other users / groups and even circles on your local instance. A lot more cool features are planned for future versions. App icon by [Icons8](https://icons8.com) and mindmaps powered by [Vis.js](http://visjs.org/)
* ✏️Create / edit / delete mindmaps * 💬 Add a description to your mindmap * 👥 Share with your team, friends or family * 🚀 Get your ideas organized
info.author: Kai Schröer
